ing: 4 (1.5 fluid ounce) jiggers creme de cacao liqueur
des: "I discovered this AMAZING shake on a cruise to Mexico.  It's very refreshing and you almost forget there's alcohol!  Great as an after dinner drink or lounging by the pool. Plastic monkey optional!  Enjoy!"
ins: Place the ice, banana liqueur, creme de cacao, ice cream, chocolate syrup, vanilla extract, milk, and banana into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth. Pour into glasses, and garnish with whipped cream and chocolate shavings to serve.
